promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic special dragon psychic-type pokemon holding an golden axe. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aurexcalibur, a a gigantic special dragon psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Power Beam. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "psychic" or "Aurexcalibur". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, dragon-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Aurexcalibur, the Golden Guardian. It emits power beams, illuminating castles, while its enormous intellect commands respect.
